attributes.action: Have a 'Neighbours' omnibus on Sundays for all to enjoy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petition to fight to have the BBC show an omnibus edition of Neighbours on Sundays at 5pm on BBC3.

As they just have close down till 7pm. And not every one can catch one of the two daily showing during the week.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
